Introduction

Lee Saerom is a South Korean singer-songwriter and dancer. She was the leader, one of the lead dancers, visuals, and the oldest member of the girl group fromis_9. Saerom competed in the second season of Dancing 9 in June 2014. She ranked 3rd in the survival show "Idol School" with 71,037 votes, earning her a spot in the group.

Saerom appeared in B2ST and Apink's "Skinny Baby" MV in 2011 and 2BiC's "Lonely Christmas" MV in 2013. She debuted as the leader of fromis_9 on January 24, 2018, with the mini album To. Heart. Saerom also participated in songwriting for several of the group's albums, including "The Way to Me" from To. Heart and "Close to Me" from To. Day.

On October 28, 2022, Saerom went on hiatus alongside Seoyeon due to health reasons, as announced by Pledis Entertainment.
